nodes.text: The HyperMatter shipping warehouse was a warehouse in the Black Hole, a hypermatter refinery on the planet Corellia. During the Galactic War, Galactic Republic forces infiltrated the warehouse and planted bugs on the hypermatter shipments in order to track their buyers.

The HyperMatter shipping warehouse is the site of the Republic mission "Eyes and Ears," which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1 along with the rest of the Black Hole.
